attributes.name: Email Marketing
attributes.summary:
## Overview
Create a comprehensive Email Marketing application in the Boxel framework that provides a complete platform for designing, sending, and analyzing email campaigns. This app should enable marketers to create beautiful emails, manage subscriber lists, automate campaigns, and track performance with advanced analytics.

## Core Components

### Campaign Management
- **Campaign Types**: Regular campaigns, automated flows, drip sequences, transactional emails
- **Template Library**: Pre-designed responsive templates for various industries and purposes
- **Drag-and-Drop Editor**: Visual email builder with content blocks
- **HTML Editor**: Code view for advanced customization
- **A/B Testing**: Subject lines, content, send times, from names
- **Scheduling**: Time zone optimization, send time personalization
- **Approval Workflow**: Multi-stage review and approval process

### List Management
- **Subscriber Database**: Centralized contact repository
- **Segmentation Engine**: Dynamic and static list segmentation
- **Import/Export Tools**: CSV, API, integration imports
- **List Hygiene**: Automatic cleaning, bounce handling, unsubscribe management
- **Preference Center**: Subscriber self-management portal
- **GDPR Tools**: Consent tracking, data requests, deletion
- **Custom Fields**: Unlimited custom subscriber attributes

### Email Design Studio
- **Visual Editor Features**:
  - Content blocks (text, image, button, divider, spacer)
  - Social media links and sharing
  - Dynamic content zones
  - Mobile-responsive design
  - Brand consistency tools
  - Image library with editing
  - Font and color management
  
- **Advanced Design Options**:
  - Custom CSS support
  - Conditional content
  - Product recommendations
  - Countdown timers
  - Interactive elements
  - AMP email support
  - Dark mode optimization

### Automation Platform
- **Workflow Builder**: Visual automation designer
- **Trigger Types**: 
  - Behavioral (opens, clicks, purchases)
  - Date-based (anniversaries, expirations)
  - List-based (joins, updates)
  - Custom events via API
  
- **Pre-built Automations**:
  - Welcome series
  - Abandoned cart recovery
  - Re-engagement campaigns
  - Birthday messages
  - Post-purchase follow-up
  - Win-back campaigns

### Analytics & Reporting
- **Campaign Metrics**: Opens, clicks, conversions, revenue
- **Subscriber Analytics**: Engagement scoring, lifetime value
- **Heat Maps**: Click and scroll tracking
- **Comparative Reports**: Campaign comparison, benchmarking
- **ROI Tracking**: Revenue attribution, cost analysis
- **Real-time Dashboard**: Live campaign monitoring
- **Custom Reports**: Build your own analytics views

## Technical Architecture

### Infrastructure
- **Sending Infrastructure**: 
  - Multiple IP pools for reputation management
  - Domain authentication (SPF, DKIM, DMARC)
  - Feedback loop processing
  - Bounce handling
  - Complaint processing
  
- **Delivery Optimization**:
  - ISP relationship management
  - Reputation monitoring
  - Deliverability testing
  - Inbox placement tracking
  - Spam score analysis

### API & Integrations
- **REST API**: Full CRUD operations for all resources
- **Webhook System**: Real-time event notifications
- **Native Integrations**:
  - E-commerce platforms (Shopify, WooCommerce)
  - CRM systems (Salesforce, HubSpot)
  - Analytics tools (Google Analytics, Segment)
  - Social media platforms
  - SMS marketing tools
  - Customer support systems

### Data Management
- **Contact Properties**: Standard and custom fields
- **Event Tracking**: Email events, custom events, web tracking
- **Data Synchronization**: Real-time sync with integrated systems
- **Backup & Recovery**: Automated backups, point-in-time recovery
- **Data Export**: GDPR-compliant data portability

## User Interface Design

### Main Dashboard
- **Overview Widgets**: Recent campaigns, subscriber growth, engagement trends
- **Quick Actions**: Create campaign, import contacts, view reports
- **Activity Feed**: Recent subscriber activity, team actions
- **Performance Snapshot**: Key metrics at a glance

### Campaign Builder Interface
- **Step-by-Step Wizard**: Recipients, content, review, send
- **Template Selector**: Filter by category, search, favorites
- **Email Editor**: Side-by-side preview (desktop/mobile)
- **Testing Tools**: Inbox preview, spam check, link validation
- **Send Options**: Immediate, scheduled, time zone send

### List Management Interface
- **Subscriber Table**: Sortable, filterable, bulk actions
- **Segment Builder**: Drag-and-drop condition builder
- **Import Wizard**: Map fields, handle duplicates
- **Growth Tools**: Forms, landing pages, pop-ups

### Automation Designer
- **Visual Canvas**: Drag-and-drop workflow nodes
- **Node Types**: Triggers, conditions, actions, delays
- **Testing Mode**: Step through automation logic
- **Performance View**: Conversion rates per step

## Advanced Features

### Personalization Engine
- **Dynamic Content**: Show different content based on subscriber data
- **Product Recommendations**: AI-powered product suggestions
- **Behavioral Targeting**: Content based on past actions
- **Geographic Customization**: Location-based content
- **Language Localization**: Multi-language campaign support

### AI-Powered Tools
- **Subject Line Optimizer**: AI suggestions for better open rates
- **Send Time Optimization**: Predict best send time per subscriber
- **Content Generation**: AI writing assistant for email copy
- **Image Selection**: AI-recommended images based on content
- **Predictive Analytics**: Churn risk, engagement probability

### Team Collaboration
- **Role-Based Access**: Admin, editor, viewer roles
- **Comments & Annotations**: In-context feedback
- **Version Control**: Track changes, restore versions
- **Approval Workflows**: Multi-stage review process
- **Team Templates**: Shared template library

### Mobile App Features
- **Campaign Monitoring**: Real-time stats on the go
- **Quick Actions**: Pause campaigns, approve sends
- **Push Notifications**: Alert for important events
- **Contact Management**: Add/edit subscribers
- **Report Viewing**: Mobile-optimized analytics

## Compliance & Security

### Privacy Compliance
- **GDPR Tools**: Consent management, data requests
- **CAN-SPAM Compliance**: Automatic footer inclusion
- **CASL Support**: Canadian anti-spam law features
- **Unsubscribe Handling**: One-click unsubscribe
- **Suppression Lists**: Global and list-specific

### Security Features
- **Two-Factor Authentication**: Account security
- **IP Whitelisting**: Restrict account access
- **Audit Logs**: Track all account activity
- **Data Encryption**: At rest and in transit
- **SSO Support**: SAML, OAuth integration

## Performance Specifications

### Scalability
- Support for millions of subscribers
- Send millions of emails per hour
- Real-time analytics processing
- Global CDN for images
- Multi-region deployment

### Reliability
- 99.9% uptime SLA
- Redundant sending infrastructure
- Automatic failover
- Queue management
- Rate limiting

## Pricing & Billing

### Billing Models
- Subscriber-based tiers
- Email volume pricing
- Feature-based plans
- Custom enterprise pricing
- Pay-as-you-go options

### Usage Tracking
- Real-time usage dashboard
- Billing alerts
- Overage handling
- Usage reports
- Cost optimization tips
